title: New: Cloud Castle Lake – Sync
content:
One of the most ambitious, ‘complete’ tracks I’ve heard in recent times, exploding onto the scene with a Sigur Rós-esque grandeur and an immaculate vocal, Cloud Castle Lake’s Sync is a mightily impressive debut.

Released through new label, Happy Valley Records, it’s lifted from their debut EP, titled Dandelion out mid-September. Check out Sync below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
